alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 4:26AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southern Kennebec... southwestern Knox...southern Oxford...Androscoggin...Lincoln... northern Cumberland...Sagadahoc...southern Coos...northeastern Grafton and northeastern Carroll Counties... At 425 AM EST...A band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Gilman to 9 miles east of Georgetown...and moving northeast AT 35 MPH. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Brunswick, Augusta, Berlin, Bath, Rockland, Gardiner, Littleton, Bridgton, Lancaster, Fryeburg, Mechanic Falls, Bethel, Bethlehem, Damariscotta, Naples, Topsham, Rumford, Wiscasset and Turner. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 20 and 51. Interstate 93 between mile markers 121 and 131. Interstate 95 between mile markers 64 and 113. This also includes... Crawford Notch State Park, Umbagog Lake State Park, Kilkenny Ridge Trail, Mount Jefferson, and Mount Madison. Burnt Island, Metinic Island, Friendship Long Island, Cranberry Island, and Otter Island.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos
